issue.title: [CF 619] Run too long error
issue.body:
Happens when trying to start editing bars first time after load or ReloadUI.
Current Beta client

1x TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r610.lua:2770: script ran too long
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r610.lua:2770: in function "LoadOptions"
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r610.lua:1962: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1955>

comments.body:
This is going to happen when you try and configure in combat. There is no way around it, but it isn't causing any problems.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
